item.title: ARCS
item.description: Advocates for residential communities and and schools (ARCS) is a policy group that supports sensible growth. Their action page has useful information.

item.title: newsletter
item.description: Keep updated by subscribing to a monthly update via email regarding upcoming events around Creekside Elementary.
